org.bson

Class BSONReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.BSONReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BSONBinaryReader

    public abstract class BSONReader
extends Object
implements Closeable
